title: I'm Dumb and That Is Good Actually
content: Software engineers tend to be smart cookies, not me, but in general. I am writing this post to beg you all to stop writing such complicated shit when you really really don't have to. I am not saying that you should write bad code, but you should write code that is as simple as possible. A rock is the best tool until you know you need a hammer, then you get a hammer.

title: Self Taught vs. University
content: As a self taught software engineer myself, I feel like it is appropriate for me to weigh in on this subject. Clearly, I cannot say that earning a degree does not help you. There are many things that I have to spend time learning just to catch up. However, I do think that the self taught route is a viable option for many people. If I had the option to do college over again, I would absolutely get my degree in Computer Science. I think that says something at least.
